data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 4,358,323 lost people in  Xiaogan, Hubei, China have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Xiaogan, Hubei, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Xiaogan words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.section_summary: On average, 6 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Xiaogan, Hubei, China.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, help the church in the county of Xiaogan to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Xiaogan, Hubei, China.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Tujia people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, teach the 364,133 believers in Xiaogan that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Xiaogan, Hubei, China. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Xiaogan, Hubei, China so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.
